name: Hydrogen
description: The lightest element. One of the most abundant elements in the universe.

name: Oxygen
description: An element essential for life. Supports combustion.

name: Carbon
description: The foundation of life. Main component of organic compounds.

name: Iron
description: A metal with strength and magnetism. Basic material of civilization.

name: Copper
description: A metal with excellent conductivity. Ideal for electrical conduction.

name: Silicon
description: The main material for semiconductors. Essential for modern technology.

name: Aluminum
description: A lightweight and corrosion-resistant metal.

name: Gold
description: A beautiful and non-corrosive precious metal.

name: Water
description: The source of life. The most basic compound.

name: Carbon Dioxide
description: A gas necessary for plant photosynthesis.

name: Salt
description: A compound of sodium and chlorine. Important as a seasoning.

name: Sand
description: Mainly composed of silicon dioxide. Raw material for glass.

name: Clay
description: Soil composed of fine particles. Raw material for pottery.

name: Wood
description: Natural material obtained from trees.

name: Stone
description: Basic material that forms the earth's crust.

name: Coal
description: A fuel rich in carbon. Important as an energy source.

name: Glass
description: A transparent material made by melting sand at high temperature.

name: Ceramic
description: A hard material made by firing clay.

name: Iron Ingot
description: A block of refined iron. Suitable shape for processing.

name: Copper Ingot
description: A block of refined copper.

name: Steel
description: An alloy of iron and carbon. High strength.

name: Bronze
description: An alloy of copper and tin. Used since ancient times.

name: Brass
description: An alloy of copper and zinc. Used for decoration.

name: Plastic
description: A synthetic material made from petroleum. Versatile.

name: Rubber
description: A material rich in elasticity. Used for sealing and cushioning.

name: Paper
description: A thin material made from wood. Used for recording.

name: Fabric
description: A flexible material made from fibers.

name: Leather
description: Material processed from animal skin.

name: Concrete
description: A building material made by mixing cement

name: Brick
description: A building block made by firing clay.

name: Wire
description: A conductor made by covering copper wire with insulation.

name: Circuit Board
description: A board for placing electronic circuits.

name: Motor
description: A device that converts electricity into motion.

name: Gear
description: A mechanical part that transmits rotation.

name: Spring
description: A part that stores elastic energy.

name: Screw
description: A small part for fixing components.

name: Bolt
description: A part for fixing large components.

name: Pipe
description: A tube for transporting liquids and gases.

name: Valve
description: A valve for controlling flow.

name: Pump
description: A device for moving liquids and gases.

name: Battery
description: A device that stores electrical energy.

name: Lens
description: A transparent part that refracts light.

name: Mirror
description: A surface that reflects light.

name: Magnet
description: An object that generates a magnetic field.

name: Sensor
description: An electronic component that detects the environment.

name: LED
description: Light-emitting diode. An efficient light source.

name: Transistor
description: A semiconductor that amplifies and switches electronic signals.

name: Resistor
description: An electronic component that limits current.

name: Capacitor
description: An electronic component that stores electric charge.

name: Hammer
description: A tool for hitting things.

name: Saw
description: A tool for cutting wood.

name: Drill
description: A tool for drilling holes.

name: Wrench
description: A tool for turning screws.

name: Screwdriver
description: A tool for turning small screws.

name: Knife
description: A blade for cutting things.

name: Axe
description: A large blade for cutting wood.

name: Shovel
description: A tool for digging soil.

name: Pickaxe
description: A tool for digging hard ground.

name: Flashlight
description: A portable tool that emits light.

name: Clock
description: A device that displays time.

name: Calculator
description: An electronic device that performs calculations.

name: Radio
description: A device that receives radio waves.

name: Camera
description: A device that records images.

name: Phone
description: A device for long-distance communication.

name: Computer
description: An advanced device that processes information.

name: Robot
description: A machine that performs tasks automatically.

name: Car
description: A vehicle for transporting people and goods.

name: Truck
description: A large vehicle for transporting large quantities of goods.

name: Airplane
description: A vehicle that flies through the air.

name: Ship
description: A large vehicle that travels on the sea.

name: Rocket
description: A propulsion device that flies into space.

name: Book
description: A medium that records knowledge.

name: Painting
description: A record of artistic expression.

name: Music
description: The art of sound.

name: Bread
description: Basic food.

name: Cheese
description: Fermented dairy product.

name: Wine
description: Fermented fruit drink.

name: Chocolate
description: Sweet confectionery.

name: Coffee
description: Stimulating drink.

name: Fire
description: A phenomenon of combustion. Generates energy and light.

name: Electricity
description: The flow of electric charge. The power source of modern civilization.

name: Steam
description: The state when water vaporizes. Can be used as power.

name: Solar Panel
description: A device that converts sunlight into electricity.

name: Wind Turbine
description: A device that converts wind power into electricity.

name: Nuclear Reactor
description: A device that generates energy through nuclear fission.

name: Tin
description: A soft metal. Material for bronze.

name: Zinc
description: A metal used as material for brass.

name: Silver
description: A beautiful and highly conductive precious metal.

name: Gallium
description: A metal used in semiconductors.

name: Uranium
description: A radioactive element that undergoes nuclear fission.

name: Cement
description: The main component of concrete.

name: Gravel
description: A collection of small stones.

name: Acid
description: A compound that promotes chemical reactions.

name: Fuel
description: A substance that burns to generate energy.

name: Canvas
description: Cloth for painting.

name: Paint
description: Material for adding color.

name: Flour
description: Grain ground into powder.

name: Milk
description: The raw material for dairy products.

name: Grape
description: A fruit. Raw material for wine.

name: Cocoa
description: Raw material for chocolate.

name: Sugar
description: A sweetener.

name: Coffee Bean
description: Raw material for coffee.

name: Limestone
description: A rock that is a raw material for cement.

name: Oil
description: A liquid fuel and material.
